text: @realDonaldTrump Sure, bc YOU, despite the warnings of Coronavirus, ALLOWED International air to continue to depart in U.S. Metro Cities like #Chicago #Detroit #NewYork where cases and deaths have been the worst from the start AND YOU REFUSE to Be Responsible with PPE, Vents, etc...
